response.original_title: OCCUPY WALL STREET, THE 99% JOIN IN
response.overview: Short visit to Zuccotti Park. Flo and I walk along Broadway and meet no less that 50,000 people turning onto Broadway at Chambers Street. The event was way under-reported. So far it seems only the cops have benefited, getting endless overtime pay for doing nothing except some beating up on people, chemical spraying and arresting folks for their own personal diversion.
response.title: OCCUPY WALL STREET, THE 99% JOIN IN
